price: Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Ɛdeεn na asi wo kwan a wamfa w’anim ammutu fͻm wͻ aberε a Mahyε woͻ?” Ɔkaa sε: “Mekyεn no; Wo bͻͻ me firii gyem, εna Wo bͻͻ ͻno nso firii nεteε mu”.
arabic: قَالَ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَلَّا تَسۡجُدَ إِذۡ أَمَرۡتُكَۖ قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla mā manaʿaka allā tasjuda idh amartuka qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
